queries.title: BaseSettingsScreen_Query
queries.description: Query for the base settings screen, using the baseScreen_QueryFragment which includes account extensions and logo.

mutations.title: editAccountSettingsForm_SetAccountSettingsMutation
mutations.description: Mutation to update account settings related to enforcing two-factor authentication for accounts with the TwoFAAccountExtension.

fragments.title: baseScreen_QueryFragment
fragments.description: Fragment for base screen query showing current account extensions and base logo.

fragments.title: BaseHeader_LogoFragment
fragments.description: Fragment for displaying file-based logo inside the base header.
